Description: CloudFormation template to deploy an Amazon EC2 instance with a security group allowing SSH access.

InstanceType.Description: Type of EC2 instance to deploy
InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

InstanceId.Description: The Instance ID of the created EC2 instance

PublicIP.Description: The public IP address of the EC2 instance
